name: HOSPITAL (hayden541)
description:
Project Name： Hospital

Your Name:XINYI WU

Project Idea: By exploring the scene to find the way to the basement level, you need to eliminate obstacles and pick up props to survive.

How to Play: Use WASD to control the walking direction and the space bar to jump, touch the props to automatically pick them up, the left mouse button to launch the throwing knife, and the P key to call out the menu. To avoid the enemy is the flashlight, pay attention to the mines under your feet, you can use two throwing knives to kill the enemy and one throwing knife to destroy the mines.
